title: I have a reminder stuck in my Google calendar widget. It (correctly) doesn't show in the app however
content: I have a reminder stuck in my Google calendar widget. It doesn't show in the app however (which is correct as I've deleted the reminder). I've removed the widget, uninstalled all calendar storage/cache/notifications/data, rebooted the phone. Reinstalled and updated the Google calendar app and then re-added the widget, but the same problem persists. Unticking the "reminders" option in the app under my Gmail account does remove this reminder, however it removes all reminders, which I don't want to happen. How do I get rid of this one stuck reminder in the widget? Thanks
